modifier.tinkersdiving.backtank.desc: Stores pressurized air for diving and fire resistance. Capacity increases with modifier level.
modifier.tinkersdiving.diving_helmet.des: Allows for extended underwater breathing using pressuruzed air and enhanced underwater vision.
modifier.tinkersdiving.diving_boots.desc: Allows for improved movement underwater, reducing drag, increasing speed, and allows walking on the bottom.
modifier.tinkersdiving.modifier_descript: Adds Diving Helmet, Backtank, and Diving Boots modifiers to Tinkers’ armor, hooking into Create’s air & lava‐swim logic very jankily. Trust me, it can get a lot worse.
modifier.tinkersdiving.modifier_flavor: Dive into the depths with Tinker's Diving Modifiers!
